content.text: Hi, I need help sourcing custom printed cosmetic boxes, about 1000 units. But I have to be honest - I used a sourcing agent before and they completely scammed me. No QC was done, products arrived damaged, and I lost about . How do I know you won't do the same?

That's a real loss, and I get why you're cautious — bad sourcing agents are unfortunately common in this space.

Here's how we're different: every order goes through a *sampling stage* first — you approve a physical sample before bulk production starts. Then we do *QC inspection* before shipment, with photos and reports sent to you.

For custom printed cosmetic boxes at 1,000 units, you're looking at roughly *$0.30–$1.50/unit* depending on material (cardboard, rigid box, kraft), size, and print complexity (1-color vs full CMYK). So your total would land around *$300–$1,500*.

What type of cosmetic product are these for? (Knowing the size and weight helps me match the right box style and material.)

Rigid boxes for my lipstick line. Full color print, magnetic closure. But before we talk product - what happens if products arrive damaged? Who pays? And do you have real photos of QC you've done before?

Totally fair questions — let me answer directly.

*If products arrive damaged*, it depends on the shipping terms. With DDP (door-to-door), the supplier bears risk until delivery. We also recommend transit insurance (~2-3% of order value) which covers damage claims fully.

*QC photos* — yes, our team does on-site inspection before shipment and sends you a full photo report (product close-ups, packaging, drop test results for boxes). I don't have past reports to share in chat, but you'll get yours before anything ships.

Now — rigid magnetic closure boxes for lipstick with full CMYK print, that's a premium tier. You're looking at roughly *$1.20–$2.50/unit* at 1,000 units depending on finish (matte lamination, spot UV, foil stamping). What finish style are you going for? (This is the biggest price swing — foil stamping alone can add $0.30-0.50/unit.)
